lines.text: Wagstaffe? Are you by any chance related to Admiral Wagstaffe?
Remotely, yes. He's a distant cousin.
But he would speak for you?
Well, I'm quite sure that he...
Admiral Wagstaffe - how well do you know him?
You claim that, do you? Do you also claim to be a mad-man? For to have constantly visited someone who does not exist?
Not exist! Would I not know my own cousin?
I invented him a moment ago.
Ship's company ready to witness punishment, sir.
if we come through this voyage safely...

[Crawford looks up from his work]
Yes? If?
To have followed Admiralty instructions may not be quite be enough.

I will not be bullied or threatened and I intend to be obeyed! Your friends in London mean nothing to me! I assure you that while you serve aboard this ship, they will mean absolutely nothing to you! You can go now.
